en.title: SEE Conf 2021 arrives as scheduled. Experience the ultimate beauty of technology.
en.description: SEE Conf 2021 will be held on January 9, 2021 at Ant Z Space in Hangzhou. Let’s take a look at the highlights~

en.title: Announcing dumi 1.1, a better component development tool for you!
en.description: What we want to share with you on the eve of 2021 is the v1.1.0 of brand new dumi

en.title: How to do ‘Anticipatory Design’？
en.description: Master the method to make you a step earlier than your users!

cn.title: 这几个 Ant Design 色彩的小知识，我猜你不知道！
cn.description: Ant Design 发展到今天，体系越来越完善。今天不说大道理，就给大家科普几个Ant Design 色彩的小知识

cn.title: 易用度在企业级中后台产品的探索和实践
cn.description: 作为产品设计者，经常遇到一个备受灵魂拷问的问题：怎么衡量我们设计的产品，用户体验是过关的？

cn.title: 通过 200+ 产品设计实践给产品体验探索一个好用标准
cn.description: 「体验」是个抽象的词，怎么把抽象的概念拆解成可落地的策略，用到企业中后台产品上？怎么衡量策略的有效性？

cn.title: 树形控件在生产力工具中的设计
cn.description: 惊！半年实践血泪史，3000 字深度好文，一个爱树的设计师手把手教你如何设计「树 」！

en.title: The variation of forms: Modularized forms in Ant Design
en.description: Let's take a closer look at the list, and how we should improve its versatility and coverage.

en.title: Everyone can be an Illustrator: Modularizing Illustration with Ant Design HiTu
en.description: Ant Design HiTu aims to modularize layout, color, shapes, and a series of design guidelines.

en.title: A Peek into Ant Design 4.0：Going Dark
en.description: The dark mode is becoming one of the most requested features. Ant Design began exploring the dark mode in our 4.0 upgrade.

en.title: A Peek into Ant Design 4.0：Flow of Information
en.description: A typical user interface design process involves a large amount of information organization and orchestration.
